title: TWRP officially adds support for Galaxy S20, Note 20 series, plus more
content:
The popular third-party TWRP recovery for Android has now officially added support for the Samsung Galaxy S20 and Note 20 series alongside a plethora of other devices.

description: The popular third-party TWRP recovery for Android has now officially added support for the Samsung Galaxy S20 and Note 20 series plus more.
